buildCommand: cd contrust-main/Contractee && flutter/bin/flutter build web --release --base-href=/ --dart-define=SUPABASE_URL=${SUPABASE_URL} --dart-define=SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=${SUPABASE_ANON_KEY} --dart-define=SUPABASE_ADMIN_ACCOUNT=${SUPABASE_ADMIN_ACCOUNT} --dart-define=PAYMONGO_PUBLIC_KEY=${PAYMONGO_PUBLIC_KEY} --dart-define=PAYMONGO_SECRET_KEY=${PAYMONGO_SECRET_KEY} --dart-define=APP_BASE_URL=${APP_BASE_URL} && ls -la build/web/
installCommand: cd contrust-main/Contractee && if cd flutter; then git pull && cd ..; else git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git; fi && ls && flutter/bin/flutter doctor && flutter/bin/flutter clean && flutter/bin/flutter config --enable-web
